attributes.name: Grasping Light
attributes.description: "We reach deep within ourselves in an attempt to understand, when really we need only look at the impact with have on others to see."
attributes.parsed_description: "We reach deep within ourselves in an attempt to understand, when really we need only look at the impact with have on others to see."

attributes.name: Gravdigger's Torch
attributes.description: "Light the dark as you bury your friends."
attributes.parsed_description: "Light the dark as you bury your friends."

attributes.name: Gravebreaker
attributes.description: "This blade was burried with its weilder... and the wielder before that... and before that."
attributes.parsed_description: "This blade was burried with its weilder... and the wielder before that... and before that."

attributes.name: Gravekeeper
attributes.description: "Corpses belong in the ground. Once they start rising again, it's time to break out the hammer."
attributes.parsed_description: "Corpses belong in the ground. Once they start rising again, it's time to break out the hammer."

attributes.name: Gravekeeper's Glove
attributes.description: "Nothing protects against corpses like a cold deeper than that of the grave."
attributes.parsed_description: "Nothing protects against corpses like a cold deeper than that of the grave."

attributes.name: Gravekeeper's Torch
attributes.description: "Keep watch over the dead, for they are restless and dangerous."
attributes.parsed_description: "Keep watch over the dead, for they are restless and dangerous."

attributes.name: Graverobber
attributes.description: "Stealing from the dead is risky business."
attributes.parsed_description: "Stealing from the dead is risky business."

attributes.name: Graverobber's Fire Staff
attributes.name_with_affixes: Graverobber's Fire Staff of the Scholar
attributes.description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."
attributes.parsed_description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."

attributes.name: Graverobber's Flatbow
attributes.description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."
attributes.parsed_description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."

attributes.name: Graverobber's Great Axe

attributes.description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."
attributes.parsed_description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."

attributes.name: Graverobber's Hatchet
attributes.description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."
attributes.parsed_description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."

attributes.name: Graverobber's Kite Shield
attributes.name_with_affixes: Graverobber's Kite Shield of the Soldier
attributes.description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."
attributes.parsed_description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."

attributes.name: Graverobber's Life Staff
attributes.name_with_affixes: Graverobber's Life Staff of the Sage
attributes.description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."
attributes.parsed_description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."

attributes.name: Graverobber's Longsword
attributes.description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."
attributes.parsed_description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."

attributes.name: Graverobber's Musket
attributes.description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."
attributes.parsed_description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."

attributes.name: Graverobber's Round Shield
attributes.name_with_affixes: Graverobber's Round Shield of the Soldier
attributes.description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."
attributes.parsed_description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."

attributes.name: Graverobber's Spear
attributes.description: "Graverobbing, ever the risky business. If you aren't well equipped, surely the competition will be."
attributes.parsed_description: "Graverobbing, ever the risky business. If you aren't well equipped, surely the competition will be."

attributes.name: Graverobber's War Hammer
attributes.name_with_affixes: Graverobber's War Hammer of the Soldier
attributes.description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."
attributes.parsed_description: "They laughed and said 'The dead don't fight back!' I laughed with them."

attributes.name: Gravescraper
attributes.description: “They can keep crawling out of their hole, I'll be here to put them back in.”
attributes.parsed_description: “They can keep crawling out of their hole, I'll be here to put them back in.”

attributes.name: Gravewatcher
attributes.description: "Keep an eye on what rises from below."
attributes.parsed_description: "Keep an eye on what rises from below."

attributes.name: Great Axe
attributes.description: Though this axe shows clear signs of use, the blades are sharp as ever.
attributes.parsed_description: Though this axe shows clear signs of use, the blades are sharp as ever.

attributes.name: Great Axe
attributes.description: Though this axe shows clear signs of use, the blades are sharp as ever.
attributes.parsed_description: Though this axe shows clear signs of use, the blades are sharp as ever.

attributes.name: Great Axe
attributes.description: Though this axe shows clear signs of use, the blades are sharp as ever.
attributes.parsed_description: Though this axe shows clear signs of use, the blades are sharp as ever.

attributes.name: Great Axe
attributes.description: Though this axe shows clear signs of use, the blades are sharp as ever.
attributes.parsed_description: Though this axe shows clear signs of use, the blades are sharp as ever.

attributes.name: Great Axe of Geya
attributes.description: "The earth itself begs for your mercy."
attributes.parsed_description: "The earth itself begs for your mercy."

attributes.name: Great Axe of the Colossal Breach
attributes.name_with_affixes: Great Axe of the Colossal Breach
attributes.description: "I had never seen a portal quite so big. Instantly I was filled with dread. What would emerge from the swirling void?"
attributes.parsed_description: "I had never seen a portal quite so big. Instantly I was filled with dread. What would emerge from the swirling void?"

attributes.name: Great Axe of the Flaming Forges
attributes.name_with_affixes: Great Axe of the Flaming Forges
attributes.description: "The black forges of Myrkgaard billow day and night, producing savage weaponry for the Tempest's forces."
attributes.parsed_description: "The black forges of Myrkgaard billow day and night, producing savage weaponry for the Tempest's forces."

attributes.name: Greataxe of the Maw
attributes.description: "Peer into the darkness and see what will become of you."
attributes.parsed_description: "Peer into the darkness and see what will become of you."

attributes.name: Great Cleave Chopper
attributes.description: A Hatchet, given as a gift after fighting the Corrupted in Great Cleave.
attributes.parsed_description: A Hatchet, given as a gift after fighting the Corrupted in Great Cleave.

attributes.name: Greater Purpose
attributes.description: "Where does mankind come from? You shall find out."
attributes.parsed_description: "Where does mankind come from? You shall find out."

attributes.name: Greatstaff of Storm's Might
attributes.description: "We cannot hope to control the storm's power, only channel it for a short time."
attributes.parsed_description: "We cannot hope to control the storm's power, only channel it for a short time."

attributes.name: Greatstaff of the Light's Judgement
attributes.description: "Step into the light and be judged."
attributes.parsed_description: "Step into the light and be judged."

attributes.name: Great Staff of the Royal Torturer
attributes.name_with_affixes: Great Staff of the Royal Torturer
attributes.description: "You do not wish to talk? Perhaps a little burn will change your mind."
attributes.parsed_description: "You do not wish to talk? Perhaps a little burn will change your mind."

attributes.name: Greenkeeper
attributes.description: "Tame the wilds."
attributes.parsed_description: "Tame the wilds."

attributes.name: Greenkeeper's Axe
attributes.description: "Mythical figures to most, the Dryad Greenkeepers were fierce defenders of Aeternum's land."
attributes.parsed_description: "Mythical figures to most, the Dryad Greenkeepers were fierce defenders of Aeternum's land."

attributes.name: Greenkeeper's Blighted Hand Cannon
attributes.description: "Blight drips off the weapon, poisoning the earth beneath it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Blight drips off the weapon, poisoning the earth beneath it."

attributes.name: Greenseer's Guide
attributes.description: "The Greenseer saw many futures. This reality was not one of them."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Greenseer saw many futures. This reality was not one of them."

attributes.name: G.R.E.G
attributes.description: "When Geraldine Rebekah Elizabeth Gulliver carved her initials into the handle of this sword, it occurred to her that, should someone find it, they might think it was wielded by a man. She chuckled at the thought."
attributes.parsed_description: "When Geraldine Rebekah Elizabeth Gulliver carved her initials into the handle of this sword, it occurred to her that, should someone find it, they might think it was wielded by a man. She chuckled at the thought."

attributes.name: Grim Edict
attributes.description: “You will join us, or you will die.”
attributes.parsed_description: “You will join us, or you will die.”

attributes.name: Grim Harbinger
attributes.description: "Brace yourself. The battle has only just begun."
attributes.parsed_description: "Brace yourself. The battle has only just begun."
